from tb_disease
order by ${orderByClause}

update tb_disease set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contagious = #{contagious,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, depart = #{depart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, way = #{way,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug = #{drug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part = #{part,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insurance = #{insurance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complication = #{complication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, population = #{population,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, symptoms = #{symptoms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prevention = #{prevention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dcase = #{dcase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dcheck = #{dcheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(d.id),url,d.name,d.introduce FROM (tb_disease d RIGHT JOIN tb_item_rela_cate r on d.id = r.item_id ) RIGHT JOIN tb_cate c on r.cate_id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{cid} AND d.status = 1 ORDER BY d.id desc LIMIT #{page},#{row}
